prodNameC: ''西門子'' C型肝炎病毒量檢測試劑
ingredientsDesc:
BOX 1
Lysis Diluent (1x15mL): buffered protein solution, sodium azide (< 0.1%), preservatives
Lysis Reagent (1x2.2mL): proteinase K solution, sodium azide (< 0.1%), preservatives
Capture Probes (1x120mL): synthetic oligonucleotides, buffered solution, sodium azide (< 0.1%), preservatives
Target Probes (1x120mL): synthetic oligonucleotides, buffered solution, sodium azide (< 0.1%), preservatives
Wash A (2x440mL): buffered solution, sodium azide (< 0.1%), preservatives
Wash B (2x320mL): buffered solution, sodium azide (< 0.1%), preservatives
Capture Wells (8 strips/12 wells each): polystyrene microwells coated with synthetic oligonucleotides
Barrier Film (1x6 sheets): high density polyethylene sheets
Pre-Amplifier/Amplifier Diluent (1x28mL): buffered protein solution, sodium azide (< 0.1%), preservatives
Label Diluent (1x15mL): buffered protein solution, sodium azide (< 0.1%), preservatives
Dextran Sulfate (1x14mL): 40% dextran sulfate solution, sodium azide (< 0.1%), preservatives

Pre-Amplifier Probes (1x130mL): synthetic oligonucleotides, buffered solution, sodium azide (< 0.1%), preservatives
Amplifier Probe (1x130mL): synthetic oligonucleotides, buffered solution, sodium azide (< 0.1%), preservatives
Substrate (1x12mL): chemiluminescent substrate (Lumi-Phos® Plus)
Substrate Enhancer (1x1.2mL): aqueous solution, sodium azide (< 0.1%), preservatives

BOX 2
Label Probe (1x140mL): enzyme-labeled synthetic oligonucleotides, buffered solution, sodium azide (< 0.1%), preservatives
High Positive Control (4x105mL): human plasma containing recombinant single stranded phage DNA, sodium azide (< 0.1%), preservatives
Low Positive Control (4x105mL): human plasma containing BPL-treated HCV, sodium azide (< 0.1%), preservatives
Negative Control (4x105mL): human plasma nonreactive for HCV, sodium azide (< 0.1%), preservatives
Standards A, D (1x440mL/level): human plasma containing recombinant single stranded phage DNA, sodium azide (< 0.1%), preservatives
Standards B, C (1x220mL/level): human plasma containing recombinant single stranded phage DNA, sodium azide (< 0.1%), preservatives
Standard E (1x660mL): human plasma containing recombinant single stranded phage DNA, sodium azide (< 0.1%), preservatives
applicantAddr: 台北市南港區園區街３號８樓
efficacy: 利用核酸探針雜交放大信號定量分析系統，直接定量檢測C型肝炎病毒感染者血清或血漿中的C型肝炎病毒核醣核酸含量。本檢驗法旨在輔助治療C型肝炎患者，不用於診斷或確認C型肝炎病毒感染。

mdKind.mdKindMCodeName: B 血液學及病理學裝置

factoryDtoList.factoryAddr: 333 CONEY ST. EAST WALPOLE, MA 02032, U.S.A.
